name: Giants Technology
slogan: Build or buy online community experiences that are positive, customisable and cost-effective
description:
We are a passionate community with over 20 years experience of building #onlinecommunities for some of the world's leading brands such as Telefonica, Sony Computer Entertainment, Airbnb and giffgaff.

We noticed that during the course of building Standing on Giants we came across many great young companies that had a community vision but were just too early in their journey to need or afford Standing on Giants products and services. Their technology requirements were for a product/service with a simpler and lighter feature set. Something that was incredibly flexible, easy to configure, and even gave the ability to integrate that community into existing systems.

Our challenge, at Giants Technology, was to create something that was not only all of those things but something that was affordable. Something that could be up and running in a couple of hours, with ready to use API's for quick and seamless integration, without the need for any extra development from us, handing control back to the customer.

So that’s what we've done. We are very excited to announce we have a working web version, and a #Unity SDK version, ready to use from May 2020. Both versions run off the same core engine and are accessible from either environment at the same time!

team.name: Vincent Boon
team.bioHtml: Founder @Standing on Giants • Worked at @giffgaff (Telefonica start up in London) @Sony Computer Entertainment, @Eidos Interactive

jobs.title: Full Stack Unity Developer
jobs.description:
About the company: 
At Giants Technology we empower businesses to build thriving online communities that put their customers at the centre of everything they do. Born from the team that created the revolutionary community-led model at mobile disruptor giffgaff, Giants Technology service offering centres on our community platform – an enterprise level SaaS product that facilitates our online communities. We work with businesses of all sizes, from market leaders to startups and scale-up businesses alike, sharing our expert knowledge and helping them launch successful communities that deliver real results.

As a company, our vision is a world where business works for the benefit of people and planet, not just profit, powered by trusting and collaborative communities. As a result, it’s important that we take active steps towards this every day in our work. Our people are, therefore, of central importance. We have a range of employee benefits to enable you to do your job to the best of your ability and we pride ourselves on our calm and relaxed workspace, supportive and open environment and shared efforts to keep our workplace (and work itself) as sustainable and eco-friendly as possible.

About the role:
We are building a new team to develop and support the platform and have a great opportunity for a Full Stack Unity Developer to join as a member of our tech team.
You will work day to day with the Founder of the company as well as other developers supporting the smooth creation of the platform. You will also get involved in product development and gain experience in up to date web development techniques and methodologies.
We need someone who is enthusiastic about new technologies, coding best practices and wants to make a contribution to a team. It's very important that you are a self-starter and quick to learn - your success in the role will be closely linked to your ability to use your own initiative to find answers and solutions. Highly self-motivated, you’re the kind of person who’s always striving to do better.
We are a small close-knit team with an open, supportive, collaborative approach to our work. We are energetic and hard-working, outspoken and individual. We try not to take ourselves too seriously and are passionate about building a company where everyone enjoys their work, feels valued and supported. Cultural fit will be as important as your hard skillset.

Role purpose:

To help develop a range of new  features and functionality, and collaborate on making genuine changes to the way we interact on the internet. To ensure our platform can link with new technology and integrate with our client’s existing features & systems where possible. To ensure the platform is developed with our community methodology in mind when designing UX.

Responsibilities:

Participate in all aspects of the development lifecycle, from inception to release
Build mobile Unity front-ends and support existing ones
Translation of designer mock-ups and wireframes into front-end code
Build a scalable back-end in Django and Python
Design and create RESTful endpoints for internal and public consumption
Provide task estimations and deliver quality code on time
Ensure all code meets defined coding standards and suitable for automated unit testing

Required Skills & Experience:

Front-End 

Proficiency with Unity
Experience with back-end and API links in Unity

Back-End
Python experience, with knowledge of at least one Python framework (Django)
Proficiency with PostgreSQL (or similar databases)
Familiarity with API Creation and RESTful services

General
Understanding of front-end MVC/MVVM frameworks
Version control with Git
Understanding of web server such as Apache and/or Nginx
Knowledge of distributed development and deployment tools (such as Docker and Jenkins)

Soft Skills
Strong analytical skills and problem-solving
Strong organisational and prioritisation skills - Able to deliver work to a deadline
Ability to work closely with different level of technical understanding

Nice to Have:

Comfortable working in an Agile environment (Scrum or Kanban) and knowledge of JIRA
Understanding and experience with unit testing
Familiarity with SSO
Database administration and management of a hosting environment
